summary:
GLASS_COCKPIT_MASTER_BLUEPRINT.md
The Definitive "Bible" for the Glass Cockpit UI V3.
Content:
1. Global Shell (OS-Level) - mapped to `ag_sessions`.
2. Orion Module (Strategist) - mapped to `OrionIngest` / `OrionManifest`.
3. Calliope Module (Creator) - mapped to `CalliopeIngest` / `CalliopeOutput`.
4. Admin Vault (The Nucleus) - mapped to `ag_agent_registry`, `ag_agent_memory`, `ag_logic_trace`.
5. UX Mechanics - Theme, Animation, Sound tokens.
